tasks.title: Morning Tribute
tasks.description: Send your daily tribute of $25 every morning by 9 AM with a grateful message expressing your devotion
tasks.reward: Good morning acknowledgment from your Goddess

tasks.title: Evening Gratitude
tasks.description: Before bed, send a thoughtful message explaining three things you're grateful for today and why you're blessed to serve Me
tasks.reward: Sweet dreams knowing you've pleased Me

tasks.title: Weekly Report
tasks.description: Submit a detailed report every Sunday of your week's activities, expenses, and how you've served Me
